item.title: Terraform nested for_each for NSX-T with dynamic
item.description: The below post show how to create security policy groups for NSX-T with Terraform nested for_each loop and dynamic. The variables are made from one map of list. Each list represent one group composed of tags. https://www.hashicorp.com/blog/hashicorp-terraform-0-12-preview-for-and-for-each variable "mapgroups" { type = map default = { NBO = ["NBO"] NBO-PROD = ["NBO","PROD"] } } resource "nsxt_policy_group" "nbogroups" { for_each = var.mapgroups display_name = each.key criteria { dynamic "condition" { for_each = each.
